REUTERS.UNKNOWN: L C f1652 reute u f BC-TX/W-OKLA-FEEDLOT-CAT 04-07 0075

TEXT.TITLE: TX/W OKLA FEEDLOT CATTLE STDY/UP 0.50 DLR-USDA
TEXT.BODY: slaughter steers were firm and heifers steady to 0.50 dlr higher in slow trade, the usda said. Feedlots reported fairly good interest and inquiry from buying sources. Sales on 3,600 steers and 700 heifers. week to date 43,900 head. steers - good and mostly choice 2-3 1025-1150 lbs 69.50-70.00. heifers - few pens good and mostly choice 2-3 925-1025 lbs 68.00-68.50. Reuter
